mapper.select: SELECT m.idx, m.name, m.email, m.point, m.insert_ts, m.phone FROM tbl_member m ORDER BY m.idx asc OFFSET (#{currPage} -1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT m.idx, m.name, m.nickname, m.email, m.phone, m.birthday, m.point, m.insert_ts FROM tbl_member m WHERE r.idx = #{idx}
